verbs.description: [ARG0: rookie jacob evans] [V: tarting] [ARGM-PRP: to come around for warriors being a bench player for warriors head coach steve kerr comes with at least one major perk you probably wo n’t go more than] a week or two without playing meaningful minutes rookie jacob evans learned that firsthand sunday night when he logged six first - quarter minutes in golden state 120 - 114 win over the nets it was the first time he has stepped on the court when the outcome was still in doubt i thought jacob was good kerr said of evans whose only stat sunday was a foul i put him out there because i thought it was a good time to put jacob in with our starters i thought he did an excellent job he just looks like he belongs out there evans was widely dubbed a steal on draft night golden state warriors warriors jacob evans steve kerr connor letourneau oregon state beavers jacob

[ARG1: rookie jacob evans] tarting to [V: come] [ARGM-DIR: around] [ARGM-PRP: for warriors] [ARGM-PRD: being a bench player for warriors head coach steve kerr] comes with at least one major perk you probably wo n’t go more than a week or two without playing meaningful minutes rookie jacob evans learned that firsthand sunday night when he logged six first - quarter minutes in golden state 120 - 114 win over the nets it was the first time he has stepped on the court when the outcome was still in doubt i thought jacob was good kerr said of evans whose only stat sunday was a foul i put him out there because i thought it was a good time to put jacob in with our starters i thought he did an excellent job he just looks like he belongs out there evans was widely dubbed a steal on draft night golden state warriors warriors jacob evans steve kerr connor letourneau oregon state beavers jacob
